com.radirius.mercury.graphics.wip.gui

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.graphics.wip.gui.Component
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlainText

    public class Component
extends Object
implements Updatable
    This is the base to a GUI system meant to minimally mimick how HTML works. There are many different settings that all components share. ANY of these can be changed, but to varying effect. Components can store other 'children' components inside of them, like the structure in an XML document would allow for. ActionCheck also allows for functionality to be built into the components, much like javascript in HTML, only more embed. There is one central rendering method that will draw every single component, allowing for extreme flexibility. Unlike swing or other GUI frameworks, this one emulates XML scripting. Therefor, the renderer is dynamic, relying only on the options of the given component.
    Author:
    wessles

      • render

        public void render(Graphics g,
          float x,
          float y)
        The generic component renderer. It will render every type of component, as well as its children, relying only on the options of the component(s).
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics object.
        x - The x position of the component
        y - The y position of the component
